mapper.insert: INSERT INTO exercise_log (member_id, exercise_date, exercise_type, exercise_time, calories_burned, fat_burned) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{exerciseDate}, #{exerciseType}, #{exerciseTime}, #{caloriesBurned}, #{fatBurned});
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM exercise_log WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND DATE(exercise_date) = #{exerciseDate};
